panels.description: The hit rate (percentage) of the LRU storage cache per cache probe.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, network_id) (aptos_storage_service_server_lru_cache{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", event="lru_cache_hit"}) / sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, network_id) (aptos_storage_service_server_lru_cache{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", event="lru_cache_probe"}) * 100

panels.title: LRU storage cache (Hit Rate)

panels.description: The compression ratios of sent network messages (i.e., compressed bytes / raw bytes)

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, client) (aptos_compression_byte_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", data_type="compressed_bytes"}) / sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, client) (aptos_compression_byte_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", data_type="raw_bytes"}) * 100
